subject: Basketball
NCAA Basketball Tournament
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: Dell Curry spent 16 seasons smooth-shooting his way through the N.B.A. and his son, Stephen, showed he can shoot a little, too, as Gonzaga found out on Friday.
snippet: Dell Curry spent 16 seasons smooth-shooting his way through the N.B.A. and his son, Stephen, showed he can shoot a little, too, as Gonzaga found out on Friday.
